get reward"},"EmergencyWithdraw(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"emergeny withdraw of pool tokens from contract"},"Harvest(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"harvest tokens from contract to get reward"},"Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"withdraw deposit tokens in contract to get reward"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addPool(uint256,address,bool)":{"details":"Only adds unique pool token","params":{"_allocPoint":"The weight of this pool. The more it is the more percentage of reward per block it will get for its users with respect to other pools. But the total reward per block remains same.","_poolToken":"The Liquidity Pool Token of this pool","_withUpdate":"if true then it updates the reward tokens to be given for each of the tokens staked"}},"addRewardTokensToContract(uint256)":{"details":"owner can add reward token to contract so that it can be distributed to users","params":{"_amount":"amount of reward tokens"}},"balanceOf(address)":{"params":{"_user":"how much reward tokens this user has"}},"constructor":{"details":"emergeny withdraw of pool tokens from contract","params":{"_rewardToken":"the token in which reward will be givenss"}},"deposit(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"deposit pool tokens to BirdFarm for reward tokens allocation.","params":{"_amount":"how many tokens you want to stake","_pid":"pool id"}},"emergencyWithdraw(uint256)":{"details":"get the pool tokens back from BardFarm without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.","params":{"_pid":"pool id"}},"harvestPendingReward(uint256)":{"details":"harvest reward tokens from BidFarm and update pool variables","params":{"_pid":"pool id"}},"migrate(uint256)":{"details":"Migrate pool token to another pool token contract. Can be called by anyone. We trust that migrator contract is good.","params":{"_pid":"the pool id"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pendingRewardToken(uint256,address)":{"details":"calculates reward tokens of a user with repect to pool id","params":{"_pid":"the pool id","_user":"the user who is calls this function"},"returns":{"_0":"pending reward token of a user"}},"poolLength()":{"details":"gets the previous rewards of user so that we can add more rewards to it and save","returns":{"_0":"total number of pools"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setAll(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"owner can set multiple values at once so it may save gas cost","params":{"_endRewardBlock":"the block at which reward token distribution ends","_rewardFrozenTime":"the block at which user can harvest reward","_rewardToken":"the token in which rewards are given","_rewardTokenPerBlock":"rewards distributed per block to community or users","_startRewardBlock":"the block at which reward token distribution starts","_unstakeFrozenTime":"the block at which user can unstake"}},"setAllocPoint(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"details":"it can change weight of pool with repect to other pools","params":{"_allocPoint":"The weight of this pool. The more it is the more percentage of reward per block it will get for its users with respect to other pools. But the total reward per block remains same.","_pid":"pool id","_withUpdate":"if true then it updates the reward tokens to be given for each of the tokens staked"}},"setEndRewardBlock(uint256)":{"details":"owner can set end reward block","params":{"_endRewardBlock":"the block at which reward token distribution ends"}},"setMigrator(address)":{"details":"owner can set a migrator contract to migrate pool tokens","params":{"_migrator":"the migrator contract"}},"setRewardFrozenTime(uint256)":{"details":"owner can set reward frozen time","params":{"_rewardFrozenTime":"the block at which user can harvest reward"}},"setRewardToken(address)":{"details":"owner can set reward token","params":{"_rewardToken":"the token in which rewards are given"}},"setRewardTokenPerBlock(uint256)":{"details":"owner can set reward token per block","params":{"_rewardTokenPerBlock":"rewards distributed per block to community or users"}},"setStartRewardBlock(uint256)":{"details":"owner can set start reward block","params":{"_startRewardBlock":"the block at which reward token distribution starts"}},"setUnstakeFrozenTime(uint256)":{"details":"owner can set unstake frozen time","params":{"_unstakeFrozenTime":"the block at which user can unstake"}},"setUpEndRewardBlock()":{"details":"owner can change last reward block so that when supply ends no more rewards generated"},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"withdraw(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"withdraw or unstake pool tokens from BidFarm","params":{"_amount":"how many pool tokens you want to unstake","_pid":"pool id"}},"withdrawRewardTokensFromContract(uint256)":{"details":"owner can withdraw reward token from contract","params":{"_amount":"amount of reward tokens"}}},"stateVariables":{"MAX_UINT":{"details":"max number used to set some variable like reward ending block initially"},"endRewardBlock":{"details":"The block number when REWARD_TOKEN distribution stops."},"poolInfo":{"details":"Info of each pool."},"rewardFrozenTime":{"details":"No froze time initially, if needed it can be added and informed to community."},"rewardToken":{"details":"The REWARD_TOKEN TOKEN!"},"rewardTokenPerBlock":{"details":"REWARD_TOKEN tokens created per block."},"startRewardBlock":{"details":"The block number when REWARD_TOKEN distribution starts."},"totalAllocPoint":{"details":"Total allocation poitns. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools."},"uniqueTokenInPool":{"details":"To prevent a token to added in multiple pools"},"unstakeFrozenTime":{"details":"No froze time initially, if needed it can be added and informed to community."},"userInfo":{"details":"Info of each user that staked tokens."}},"title":"Farming service for pool tokens","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"addPool(uint256,address,bool)":{"notice":"Adds a new pool. Can only be called by the owner."},"addRewardTokensToContract(uint256)":{"notice":"owner puts reward tokens in contract"},"balanceOf()":{"notice":"util function to get reward token balance of this contract"},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"util function to get reward token balance of this contract"},"deposit(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"deposit tokens to get rewards"},"emergencyWithdraw(uint256)":{"notice":"get the tokens which user staked. In case of EMERGENCY ONLY."},"harvestPendingReward(uint256)":{"notice":"harvest reward tokens from BardFarm"},"migrate(uint256)":{"notice":"the migarting logic"},"pendingRewardToken(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get reward tokens to show on UI"},"poolLength()":{"notice":"gets previous rewards of a user"},"setAll(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"owner can set multiple values at once"},"setAllocPoint(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Update the given pool's REWARD_TOKEN pool weight. Can only be called by the owner."},"setEndRewardBlock(uint256)":{"notice":"owner can change end reward block"},"setMigrator(address)":{"notice":"owner can set a migrator contract"},"setRewardFrozenTime(uint256)":{"notice":"owner can change reward frozen time"},"setRewardToken(address)":{"notice":"owner can change reward token"},"setRewardTokenPerBlock(uint256)":{"notice":"owner can change reward token per block"},"setStartRewardBlock(uint256)":{"notice":"owner can change start reward block"},"setUnstakeFrozenTime(uint256)":{"notice":"owner can change unstake frozen time"},"unstakeFrozenTime()":{"notice":"user can get reward and unstake after this time only."},"withdraw(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"get the tokens back from BardFarm"},"withdrawRewardTokensFromContract(uint256)":{"notice":"owner withdraws reward tokens from contract"}},"notice":"You can use this contract to deposit pool tokens and get rewards","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/home/muneeb/work/Bird devdoc.author: Bird Money
devdoc.details: Admin can add a new Pool, users can deposit pool tokens, harvestReward, withdraw pool tokens

Deposit(address,uint256,uint256).details: deposit tokens in contract to get reward

EmergencyWithdraw(address,uint256,uint25.details: emergeny withdraw of pool tokens from contract

Harvest(address,uint256,uint256).details: harvest tokens from contract to get reward

Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256).details: withdraw deposit tokens in contract to get reward

params._allocPoint: The weight of this pool. The more it is the more percentage of reward per block it will get for its users with respect to other pools. But the total reward per block remains same.
params._poolToken: The Liquidity Pool Token of this pool
params._withUpdate: if true then it updates the reward tokens to be given for each of the tokens staked

addRewardTokensToContract(uint256).details: owner can add reward token to contract so that it can be distributed to users

params._user: how much reward tokens this user has

constructor.details: emergeny withdraw of pool tokens from contract

params._rewardToken: the token in which reward will be givenss

deposit(uint256,uint256).details: deposit pool tokens to BirdFarm for reward tokens allocation.

params._amount: how many tokens you want to stake

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: get the pool tokens back from BardFarm without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.

harvestPendingReward(uint256).details: harvest reward tokens from BidFarm and update pool variables

migrate(uint256).details: Migrate pool token to another pool token contract. Can be called by anyone. We trust that migrator contract is good.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingRewardToken(uint256,address).details: calculates reward tokens of a user with repect to pool id

params._user: the user who is calls this function

returns._0: pending reward token of a user

poolLength().details: gets the previous rewards of user so that we can add more rewards to it and save

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAll(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,u.details: owner can set multiple values at once so it may save gas cost

params._endRewardBlock: the block at which reward token distribution ends
params._rewardFrozenTime: the block at which user can harvest reward
params._rewardToken: the token in which rewards are given
params._rewardTokenPerBlock: rewards distributed per block to community or users
params._startRewardBlock: the block at which reward token distribution starts
params._unstakeFrozenTime: the block at which user can unstake

setAllocPoint(uint256,uint256,bool).details: it can change weight of pool with repect to other pools

params._allocPoint: The weight of this pool. The more it is the more percentage of reward per block it will get for its users with respect to other pools. But the total reward per block remains same.
params._withUpdate: if true then it updates the reward tokens to be given for each of the tokens staked

setEndRewardBlock(uint256).details: owner can set end reward block

params._endRewardBlock: the block at which reward token distribution ends

setMigrator(address).details: owner can set a migrator contract to migrate pool tokens

setRewardFrozenTime(uint256).details: owner can set reward frozen time

params._rewardFrozenTime: the block at which user can harvest reward

params._rewardToken: the token in which rewards are given

setRewardTokenPerBlock(uint256).details: owner can set reward token per block

params._rewardTokenPerBlock: rewards distributed per block to community or users

setStartRewardBlock(uint256).details: owner can set start reward block

params._startRewardBlock: the block at which reward token distribution starts

setUnstakeFrozenTime(uint256).details: owner can set unstake frozen time

params._unstakeFrozenTime: the block at which user can unstake

setUpEndRewardBlock().details: owner can change last reward block so that when supply ends no more rewards generated

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: withdraw or unstake pool tokens from BidFarm

params._amount: how many pool tokens you want to unstake

withdrawRewardTokensFromContract(uint256.details: owner can withdraw reward token from contract

MAX_UINT.details: max number used to set some variable like reward ending block initially

endRewardBlock.details: The block number when REWARD_TOKEN distribution stops.

rewardFrozenTime.details: No froze time initially, if needed it can be added and informed to community.

startRewardBlock.details: The block number when REWARD_TOKEN distribution starts.

totalAllocPoint.details: Total allocation poitns. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools.

uniqueTokenInPool.details: To prevent a token to added in multiple pools

unstakeFrozenTime.details: No froze time initially, if needed it can be added and informed to community.

userInfo.details: Info of each user that staked tokens.

devdoc.title: Farming service for pool tokens

addPool(uint256,address,bool).notice: Adds a new pool. Can only be called by the owner.

addRewardTokensToContract(uint256).notice: owner puts reward tokens in contract

balanceOf().notice: util function to get reward token balance of this contract

balanceOf(address).notice: util function to get reward token balance of this contract

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: get the tokens which user staked. In case of EMERGENCY ONLY.

pendingRewardToken(uint256,address).notice: get reward tokens to show on UI

poolLength().notice: gets previous rewards of a user

setAll(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: owner can set multiple values at once

setAllocPoint(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Update the given pool's REWARD_TOKEN pool weight. Can only be called by the owner.

setEndRewardBlock(uint256).notice: owner can change end reward block

setMigrator(address).notice: owner can set a migrator contract

setRewardFrozenTime(uint256).notice: owner can change reward frozen time

setRewardTokenPerBlock(uint256).notice: owner can change reward token per block

setStartRewardBlock(uint256).notice: owner can change start reward block

setUnstakeFrozenTime(uint256).notice: owner can change unstake frozen time

unstakeFrozenTime().notice: user can get reward and unstake after this time only.

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: get the tokens back from BardFarm

withdrawRewardTokensFromContract(uint256.notice: owner withdraws reward tokens from contract

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to deposit pool tokens and get rewards
